text:
Adil Alviz oglu Ismayilov (; 5 July 1957 – 3 December 2020) was an Azerbaijani lawyer, jurist and investigator. He was a member of the Azerbaijani Bar Association. Ismayilov was part of the most well-known trials in Azerbaijan during the 1990s and 2000s. He was born in Goychay, Soviet Union.
Ismayilov died on 3 December 2020 from COVID-19 in Baku, Azerbaijan at the age of 63.
